en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Macau

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit Macau tomorrow (March 10).

He will meet with the Secretary for Administration and Justice of the Macau Special Administrative Region, Ms Chan Hoi Fan, to discuss matters concerning mutual legal assistance between Hong Kong and Macau.
Accompanying Mr Yuen on the visit will be Law Officer (International Law) of the Department of Justice, Ms Amelia Luk.
Mr Yuen and his colleagues will return to Hong Kong tomorrow afternoon.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師明日（三月十日）訪問澳門。
他將與澳門特別行政區行政法務司司長陳海帆會面，討論涉及香港和澳門之間的相互法律協助事宜。
隨行的還有律政司國際法律專員陸少冰。
袁國強一行將於明日下午返港。
